meanings.definition: A person higher in rank or status than another.
meanings.sent1: My superiors at work always give me helpful advice.
meanings.sent2: The company's superiors make important decisions for the business.
meanings.sent3: During the office party, my superior challenged me to a friendly game of chess.
meanings.sent4: In the school of life, our superiors guide us along the path to success.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's superiors trained him to use his powers for good.

meanings.definition: Of higher quality or greater importance.
meanings.sent1: The chef's secret sauce is of superior taste compared to others.
meanings.sent2: The superior performance of the new model impressed all the customers.
meanings.sent3: The superior cupcakes at the bakery always sell out quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her superior skills in painting earned her recognition in the art community.
meanings.sent5: The superior craftsmanship of the handmade furniture was evident in every detail.
